title_short: (07720) Es Castell - 2 Camí de les Escoles

title: (07710) Sant Lluís - 1 Avinguda Talaiot

title: (07701) Maó - Me-3
description: Small car park by the sea. Ideal to spend the night and visit La Mola Fortress. When the sun goes down there is a lot of air, so the night is placid. There is nowhere flat, but you can sleep well with falcas. There is an open wifi that works well although with little signal.

title: (07710) San Luis - 72 Me-8
description: EcoLaundry launderette - 10kg, 20kg, dryer . Parking is limited, but at the end of town (coming from Mao) there is a public car park (500m). Pay with coins (there is an exchange machine for bills) or via app (credit card, charge does not work for dryers?). Open daily from 8 a.m. to 11 p.m., last wash load possible at 10 p.m. WiFi was ok for daddling.

title: (07720) Cala de Sant Esteve - 17 Camí de sa Cala Sant Esteve
title_short: (07720) Cala de Sant Esteve - 17 Camí de sa Cala Sant Esteve

title: (07701) Mahón - Me-5

The higher vans and the motorhomes can have more problems since the pine trees are quite low. Camper environment No problem to camp. During the day it gets very busy for visitors to the beach, but in the afternoon it gets empty. There is a fountain next to the perfect soccer field to refill water.

title: (07700) Maó - 6 Carretera Grau,ctra

title: (07711) Sant Lluís - 14 Carrer des Palangre

title: (07730) Cala en Porter - 18 Paseig de la Platja

title: (07730) Alaior - 2 Carrer de les Escoles

title: (07740) Es Mercadal - 53 Diseminado Poligono 09
description: SAP service station on board Me-7 with free air and water terminal, at the entrance, on the right, before the Unleaded 95 and diesel pumps. Take an ordinary nozzle for the faucet and your hose. Quick filling because it is not a push valve. Easy parking. Payment at the cash desk during the day with a small shop selling emergency products and 24 hour card payment. WC. Trash can. Perfect to refill water on this part of the island where it is very difficult and rare to find some.

title: (07701) Maó - Carretera de Favàritx / Cf-1
description: Parking on the edge of the protected area, open in 2020. No service, not even a cell phone

title: (07740) Es Mercadal - Me-7
description: Parking next to the road. Somewhat noisy but shady, very valuable in Menorca.

title: (07740) Port d'Addaia - 229B Avinguda Port d'Addaia
description: Very quiet parking area in a residential area. Extraordinary views of the sea, Addaia port areas.  No services.

title: (07740) Es Mercadal - 12 Carrer de sa Calma
title_short: (07740) Es Mercadal - 12 Carrer de sa Calma

title: (07730) Son Bou - 6 Carretera de Son Bou
title_short: (07730) Son Bou - 6 Carretera de Son Bou

You can sleep in vans or CCs. There is neither water nor light. Beach services. 10 minutes from restaurants and bars. Quiet site. Good beach with beach bars.

title: (07740) Son Parc - 271 Avinguda de Mercadal
description: Parking completely empty, quiet and especially in the morning. Houses around

title: (07740) Es Mercadal - 342 Passatge Passerell

title_short: (07730) San Jaime Mediterráneo - 74 Passeig del Prat

title_short: (07740) Es Mercadal - 57 Carrer des Tord Negre
description: 5 places under the pine forest at the end of the path. In the shade and 50m from the beach. Perfect.

title: (07740) Es Mercadal - 355 Carrer A

title: (07740) - 136 Diseminado Poligono 11

title: (07730) Alaior - Camí de de Camí

title: (07740) Es Mercadal - 258 Travesia 3 Perdiu;P. Grossa
description: End of urbanized and paved area. Ideal for snorkelling. Quiet area away from the town. Without any kind of services.

title: (07740) Es Mercadal - 15 Diseminado Poligono 14

Area with picnic tables, near es mercadal.
Climbing site.
Departure to visit the Penya de s'Indi.

title_short: (07740) Es Mercadal - 34 Urbanització Punta Grossa, Polígon II
description: Unbuilt area, cliffs with impressive views over the sea, access is through unpaved streets, but in good condition, there is no type of service.

title: (07740) Son Parc - 483A Avinguda dels penya-segats
description: Spectacular cliff, with unevenness, without services. Within the Son Parc urbanization. Day and night.

title: (07740) Es Mercadal - 93 Avenida Vía Ronda de Ses Costes
title_short: (07740) Es Mercadal - 93 Avenida Vía Ronda de Ses Costes
description: Asphalt parking with long spaces, away from the town. It has a Galician inn nearby, rubbish bins and another dirt parking lot closer to the street. fairly quiet.

address.street: 93 Avenida Vía Ronda de Ses Costes

title: (07740) Son Parc - 8 Avinguda de la Playa
title_short: (07740) Son Parc - 8 Avinguda de la Playa
description: Parking in front of vacation homes perched on a cliff offering a magnificent panorama. We spent the night there but the police explained to us in the middle of the morning that opening the windows and being on the slipway was considered camping. We left this small seaside resort without consuming there. Too bad for them. FYI, the beach parking lot where we didn't want to sleep is next to a sewage treatment plant with foul odors.

title: (07740) Es Mercadal - 33 Avinguda del Metge Camps
title_short: (07740) Es Mercadal - 33 Avinguda del Metge Camps
description: Municipal Space Mercadal "(Menorca) located inside the fairground, charming town of 5.000h.Located in the center of the island, at the foot of Monte Toro and 15 km from Fornells.

title: (07740) Son Parc - 646B Calle Vial Arenal
description: Free parking area with access to the beach. There are areas with views. There is a bar at the access to the beach. Without shadow. Without height limitation. Very busy day but very quiet at night. Ideal for overnight. Now with Toilets on the left as you enter the  Carpark.

title: (07740) Es Mercadal - 10A Carrer de s'Hort des Jurats
title_short: (07740) Es Mercadal - 10A Carrer de s'Hort des Jurats

title: (07740) Es Mercadal - 111 Avinguda del Doctor Llansó
title_short: (07740) Es Mercadal - 111 Avinguda del Doctor Llansó
description:
In the Mercadal municipal sports center they allow you to shower for a fee.
Clean showers and toilets.

title: (07749) Sant Tomas - 6 Urbanizacion Santo Tomas
description: Large parking near the beach, nearby there is a supermarket, pharmacy and other small shops. In winter / corona weather they were closed. "Camping" is not allowed everywhere in Santo Tomas.

title: (07740) Es Mercadal - 55 Zona Biniaumaia
description: Very quiet place with trees and, therefore, shade (so valued on the island).

title: (07749) Sant Tomas - Unnamed Road

title: (07749) Es Migjorn Gran - 2G Avinguda de la Mar
title_short: (07749) Es Migjorn Gran - 2G Avinguda de la Mar
description: Good place to spend the night. Asphalt parking, only overnight stays are allowed; no chairs and tables.

title: (07749) Sant Tomas - 5I Urbanització Santo Tomàs
description: Public parking, but in winter, it is empty and it is good to park the campsite without problem. It's right next to the beach and has a small playground.

title: (07740) Es Mercadal - 14 Diseminado Poligono 16
description: Water point to fill the cans in the free service station

title: (07749) Es Migjorn Gran - Camí de Sant Agustí Nou
title_short: (07749) Es Migjorn Gran - Camí de Sant Agustí Nou
description: Very large and quiet parking area (sand) very close to the beach. Restaurant just nearby. Sea view from the places further up. Right by Cami des Cavalls and good starting point for walks/hikes to the secluded beaches of Cala Escorxada.

title: (07748) Fornells - 157 Carrer del Rosari
description: Practical parking, free, without height restriction at the entrance of the village of Fornells. Possibility of being close to the water to sleep with the pleasant sound of ripples.

title: (07748) Playas de Fornells - 14 Carrer de Baix
title_short: (07748) Playas de Fornells - 14 Carrer de Baix
description: Place near cala tirant and 1.5 km from Fornells. Large parking with asphalt. Perfect to do night

title: (07748) Fornells - 33 Passeig Maritim Gumersind Riera

title: (07748) Fornells - 1 Avinguda de sa Punta Gran
title_short: (07748) Fornells - 1 Avinguda de sa Punta Gran
description: Esplanada ideal for a motorhome or camper, there are beautiful views of the town of Fornells, at night there are two good large spotlights that illuminate the entire Esplanada, the only downside is that there are mosquitoes late in the evening or early in the morning. tomorrow

title: (07748) Es Mercadal - 20 Urbanizacion Cala Tirant
description: Stretch of land next to the beach access. There is no height limit, very quiet. No trouble sleeping.

title: (07748) Fornells - 135 Carrer Tramuntana
description: Near the tower of fornells, there is a public toilet.

title: (07748) Platges de Fornells - 5 Carrer D
description: End of the street with direct views of the sea, it is a parking area without yellow lines. Super quiet, surrounded by apartments (do not disturb). You can park on the edge with the sea a few meters away. If you want to walk, the cami de cavals pass by

title: (07750) Ferreries - 27 Carrer dels Trencadors
description: Perfect service area, you can also wash your vehicle. It is located in the polygon of Ferreries, a small town on the island where you can find shops with plenty of local products.

title: (07750) Ferreries - 29A Avenida Morera
description: A large parking lot next to a school and residences, we only stopped to eat because there was shade which is rare in Menorca.

title: (07750) Ferreries - 40 Carrer Mallorca
description: Laundry, utility room

title: (07750) Ferreries - 14 Avinguda son Morera
description: Parking next to a stream. Ferrerias is small. Near everything.

name: Camping S'Atalaia

title: (07740) Es Mercadal - Carretera Camides Far
description: Cavalry beach parking, unpaved. The places closest to the road are flat, then take a big gap. There are chemical toilets but they are not well maintained

title: (07750) Ferreries - Camí a s'Enclusa
description: Quiet and small lot next to what looks like an abandoned road surrounded by nature.

title: (07740) Es Mercadal - Camí de Binimel·là
description: Pleasant parking, without service, presence tolerated by the guardia civil. accessible to motorhomes. Very beautiful beaches nearby, pleasant bar terrace. Well aparcamiento. sin servicios. Nice place without servicies Lots of dust

title: (07750) Ferreries - Me-22
description: Quiet parking and easy to locate. Without services.

title: (07750) Ferreries - 1 Carrer d'es Riu
description: Large parking lot day and night, illuminated and in front of hotels, that is minimally guarded.

title: (07740) Es Mercadal - Carretera Camides Far
description: Free parking of the cavalry lighthouse. At sunset, there are many people to see the sunset, but it is very quiet. There are well-maintained public toilets  during lighthouse opening hours and a small bar.

title: (07750) Serpentona - 8 Passatge Riu
description: Several herringbone spaces along the road, for van only. We stayed there the day to hike to San Saura. Cala Galdana beach 2 min walk

title: (07750) - 21 Diseminado es Canalo
description: Excellent place to see and visit el barranco d'algendar! walk (1-1.30 h) superb! peaceful and shady place! the first house down on the right is a summer camp that has six open toilets that you can use for your needs (with its old mill mechanism)! this place is private but can help in case of big desire! be clean!

title: (07750) Serpentona - 1C Costa Mirador
description: Battery parking, 5 minutes from Cala Galdana, maximum motorhomes of 6.5m, in the middle of August it is difficult to park in this area.

title: (07750) Serpentona - 443 Passatge Riu
description: The hotel has a mini foot shower. Here I was able to refill water. If we go with a cure we can make some carafe filling.

title: (07750) Serpentona - 106 Urbanització Serpentona
description: Unpaved road but with an esplanade, although a little noise because it is next to a hotel.

title: (07750) Serpentona - 15B Carrer Pins
description: Here we can sleep peacefully. I found 3-4 more campers. At night nobody usually happens. There are stairs that lead to Cala Macarelleta. There is field area. I could not get to take pictures but if you search on Google view you can see a good site

title: (07769) Ciutadella de Menorca - Camí Alfurí de Baix
title_short: (07769) Ciutadella de Menorca - Camí Alfurí de Baix
description:
Parking to go to Cala del Pilar. There is a chemical toilet. The creek is 30 min. on foot, so there are usually not many cars. There is a little shade. We only had a one-day stopover, but it seems like a great quiet place to spend the night.

Motorhomes and vans cannot park. Small vans only.

title: (07769) Ciutadella de Menorca - Camí de Cala en Turqueta
title_short: (07769) Ciutadella de Menorca - Camí de Cala en Turqueta
description: Cala Turqueta Parking, from here you can access Cala Turqueta, Macarella, Macarelleta. Very quiet to sleep but a lot of dust, there is a little shade, the access road is very narrow so it is recommended to arrive early or late in the afternoon

name: Poblat talaiotic de Torre Trencada
title: (07769) Poblat talaiotic de Torre Trencada
description: Parking in the Talayotic village of Torretrencada. There are no prohibition signs for motorhomes. Very calm and interesting site. Beware of large motorhomes because the road is narrow. To get to town, you have to walk about 10 minutes

title: (07769) Ciutadella de Menorca - Son Camps
description:
Parking in the Talayotic village of Torrellafuda. It is wide and quiet, and it even has a cherry on it, it is close to the road, but it is a secondary road, so it is very quiet, even to spend the night. Watch out for big campers!

In the mornings, trucks that make noise and raise dust do not stop passing, I suppose there is a farm nearby... there is only space under the tree for one (height not valid for a motorhome).

title: (07769) Ciutadella de Menorca - Camí de Son Teri Vell
title_short: (07769) Ciutadella de Menorca - Camí de Son Teri Vell
description: Public parking with wc.

title: (07769) Ciutadella de Menorca - Camí d'Algaiarens
description: Second car park in cala Algaiarens, very quiet, surrounded by nature, unpaved car park. No shade.

title: (07769) Tudons - Me=1
description: Large car park to visit Naveta des Tudons. Room for large RVs, no height limit. Right next to the main road.

title: (07769) Son Xoriguer - 6 Urbanizacion Son Xoriguer
description: We have not done night but there is to park here and spend the night. very calm. There are no shadows.

title: (07769) Son Xoriguer - 15A Carrer Península
description: Parking of a beautiful beach. Ideal for the night. Very calm. Free, there are showers on the other side of the beach (in the restaurant).

title: (07769) Ciutadella de Menorca - 249 Carretera Camí de Cala Morell
title_short: (07769) Ciutadella de Menorca - 249 Carretera Camí de Cala Morell
description: Parking lot next to Necropolis monument. Came here because of the strong wind directly at the ocean. Next day I realized that I was parking next to an amazing Necropolis.

title: (07769) Cala Morell - 64 Calle Corona Austral
description: Beach access parking

title: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - Camí Vell de Maó
title_short: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - Camí Vell de Maó
description: Indoor swimming pool with gym, you can use the facilities or just take a shower (hot water?)

title: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 7 Carrer sa Carnisseria
title_short: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 7 Carrer sa Carnisseria
description: Clean point for motorhomes, works with a bank card. It is located in an industrial area, far from the urban center, but you can park without problem throughout the City.

title: (07769) Ciutadella de Menorca - 7 Carrer dels Angelos
title_short: (07769) Ciutadella de Menorca - 7 Carrer dels Angelos
description: Day and night ground parking. Quiet and spacious. We sleep with 2 ac.

title: (07769) Ciutadella de Menorca - 13 Carrer Orio
description: Parking for about 5/6 vehicles in a row. Just 2 minutes from Cala Morell. Very quiet and ideal place to go in the evening to sleep and wake up to be one of the first to be in Cala Morell. The restaurant downstairs opens at 11am and the only noise is the garbage truck that passes around 8am.

title: (07769) Ciutadella de Menorca - 4 Carrer de s'Auriga
title_short: (07769) Ciutadella de Menorca - 4 Carrer de s'Auriga
description: Parking with splendid views of the surrounding cliffs and the sea. Very quiet. Neighbors agreement

title: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 10 Carrer dels Ferrers
title_short: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 10 Carrer dels Ferrers
description: Elefante Azul, car wash with ladder for tall vehicles.

title: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 2 Avinguda Palma de Mallorca
title_short: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 2 Avinguda Palma de Mallorca
description: Large paved parking lot, quite full. There is a water fountain and a playground next to the Skate Park.

title: (07769) Son Carrió - 1 Carrer des Rupit
description: Small car park, empty out of season. Shower, toilet access currently closed, restaurants are also closed. Possibility of picnic on the beach, near citadella and Cala Blanca

title: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - Me-1
description: Gas station with service to recharge water

title: (07769) Ciutadella de Menorca - 5 Avinguda Llevant

title_short: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 13 Diseminado Son Fornaris
description: Butane and propane cylinder sales point (Repsol)

title: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 7 Avinguda Palma de Mallorca
title_short: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 7 Avinguda Palma de Mallorca
description: 24h laundry automatic machines

title: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 17 Avinguda Palma de Mallorca
title_short: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 17 Avinguda Palma de Mallorca
description: Ground parking. We haven't spent the night, but it's fine to leave the van and go downtown. It is a bit far from the center, but Menorca in summer and its parking lots... complicated, since they are quite full

title: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - s/n Carrer de Sant Antoni Mª. Claret
title_short: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - s/n Carrer de Sant Antoni Mª. Claret
description: Pk. large, next to a health center. It has many parking spaces suitable for long vehicles such as motorhomes. Free and without a time limit, it is never crowded and it is very quiet, easy access from the perimeter road, 300 meters away is the city center. Shops, bars and restaurants 200 meters.

address.street: s/n Carrer de Sant Antoni Mª. Claret

title: (07769) Ciutadella de Menorca - 86 Avinguda Llevant
description: Quiet place with views of the sea, walking 10 minutes to the south you reach s'aigu dolça place of turquoise waters

title: (07769) Ciutadella de Menorca - 3 Urbanització Cala Blanca P-B
title_short: (07769) Ciutadella de Menorca - 3 Urbanització Cala Blanca P-B
description: Parking 10 min walk from Cala Blanca. We arrived in the late afternoon and it was practically empty. Grocery store in front. We did not spend the night because Cala Blanca smelled quite bad but the place seemed quiet to spend the night.

title: (07769) Ciutadella de Menorca - 21 Passatge Pinós
description: Parking in Cala Blanca. Next to a woodland with games for children. In front of Apartamentos Maribel, with a drink and a fee access to the pool, children's area and laundry. Close to supermarkets, bars and restaurants. In the same street further on there is another larger parking lot.

title: (07769) Son Carrió - 11 Carrer des Falciot
description: Wooded place next to the Santandria cove. Lots of shade. Capacity for 5 or 6 motorhomes and / or vans. Arrive too early or too late to get a seat.

title: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 2 Camí Vell de Maó
title_short: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 2 Camí Vell de Maó
description: It's a dirt car park that's close enough to the city center to be strolling but quiet given that it's in a non-tourist area. A fountain on its west wall. It allows you to rest well although a motorcycle passes by making noise at dusk near the adjoining street. It is a good place to return from the town after having a drink, as there is hardly any loss to get there from El Molino.

title: (07769) Cap d'Artrutx - 2 Passeig Marítim
description: Ideal to spend the night in front of the ferry. The area is very well-kept, overnight stays safe, occasionally a few strollers. There is a supermarket around the corner to go shopping for a picnic on the ferry. 10km on a wide road to the Balearia Terminal, beautiful sunset in the evening.

title: (07769) Son Carrió - 36 Carrer de sa Guàtlera
title_short: (07769) Son Carrió - 36 Carrer de sa Guàtlera
description: Very quiet place and very close to the sea on the cliff, there is a large space where you can park a motorhome, we only slept, we did not leave neither awning nor chairs. Nearby there is a place called "es clot" type pool in the sea with stairs to go out.

title: (07769) Cap d'Artrutx - 136 Passeig Marítim
description: It is away from everything, 7 km from Ciudatdella. In Cap de Altrux. But perfect for sunset and sleep very quiet with a feeling of security. The villas on this street do not have any security elements, which gives you an idea. We sleep alone. Plain parking online and / or battery. Recommendable.

title: (07769) Ciutadella de Menorca - 1 Passeig sa Caleta
title_short: (07769) Ciutadella de Menorca - 1 Passeig sa Caleta
description: Very practical when you have to spend the night in Ciutadella, this pleasant parking overlooks a charming little cala. There is a small bar and shops nearby. 5 minutes from the port for ferries by car.

title: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 1C Carretera Santandria
description: Quiet parking for sleeping and walking, less than 10 minutes, to the center of Ciutadella. It has no services. There is a grass park next to the car park.

title: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 109 Camí d'es Degollador
title_short: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 109 Camí d'es Degollador
description: Self-service laundry, has a change machine and soap is included in the price

title: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 87 Avinguda del Capità Negrete
title_short: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 87 Avinguda del Capità Negrete
description: Fountain where to recharge drinking water. The water is of a high quality, and suitable for drinking. The jet that comes out is not very powerful, approx... 10L/min

title: (07769) Son Blanc - 9 Carrer Vorera dels Molls
title_short: (07769) Son Blanc - 9 Carrer Vorera dels Molls
description: Quiet parking in front of the sea. Just below is a cave where people go snorkeling. Nearby is the cove to bathe and a bar that make sandwiches

title: (07769) Son Blanc - 1 Carrer de Na Claró
title_short: (07769) Son Blanc - 1 Carrer de Na Claró
description: Car park closest to the pier. Calm. No service but view of the sea and Majorca

title: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 6 Passeig es Pla de Sant Joan
title_short: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 6 Passeig es Pla de Sant Joan
description: Good place to park to access the Port of Ciutadella and walk. It is a dirt parking lot with plenty of room.

address.street: 6 Passeig es Pla de Sant Joan

title: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 79 Carrer de Santa Bàrbara
title_short: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 79 Carrer de Santa Bàrbara

title: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - nº2 Carrer del Mestre Bartomeu Carreras
title_short: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - nº2 Carrer del Mestre Bartomeu Carreras

title: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 41 Camí de sa Farola
title_short: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 41 Camí de sa Farola
description: Perfect for parking and seeing Ciutadella, perfect sleep in the middle of July, fresh sea air, fantastic views

title: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 56 Passeig Marítim

title_short: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 27 Avinguda Ciutat de l'Alguer

title: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 6 Passeig Marítim
description: Very quiet parking space in front of the castle of Sant Nicolau. Many parking spaces available.

title: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 7 Camí de sa Farola
title_short: (07760) Ciutadella de Menorca - 7 Camí de sa Farola
description: On the whole Camí sa farola avenue until reaching the beach you can park without problem. A lot of shade all day. the beach is small cove without sand but with places to put the towel. the bathroom is perfect

title: (07769) Ciudadela de Menorca - 817 Ronda de sa Punta
title_short: (07769) Ciudadela de Menorca - 817 Ronda de sa Punta
description: Quiet parking at night with some shade in the morning, which is scarce in this part of the island and is key in summer. It is not private, there is no sign indicating it

title: (07769) Cala en Blanes - 9 Calle Toore de l'Aigua-c.blanes
title_short: (07769) Cala en Blanes - 9 Calle Toore de l'Aigua-c.blanes

title_short: (07769) Cala en Blanes - 7 Calle Toore de l'Aigua-c.blanes

title: (07769) Torre del Ram - 20 Avinguda Cala en Brut
title_short: (07769) Torre del Ram - 20 Avinguda Cala en Brut

title: (07769) Torre del Ram - Av. Cala en Brut
title_short: (07769) Torre del Ram - Av. Cala en Brut

title_short: (07769) Torre del Ram - 82 Urbanització Cala Bruch

name: Parking Punta Nati
title: (07769) Parking Punta Nati
description: Parking without prohibition signs for the night. It is about 300 meters from Punta Nati. It must be very hot in summer. There is no tree. Cliffs and passage area of Cami de Cavall. There is enough space.

title: (07769) Ciutadella de Menorca - 3B Avinguda los Delfines
title_short: (07769) Ciutadella de Menorca - 3B Avinguda los Delfines
description: Quiet place, with incredible views, at night it is quite airy, you can see the stars perfectly, bars nearby to go on foot and take a walk

title: (07769) Los Delfines - Avinguda des Pont d En Gil
title_short: (07769) Los Delfines - Avinguda des Pont d En Gil

title: (07769) Cales Piques - 707 Ub Cala Picas
description: Parking, we slept perfectly, ideal sunset, little path to go down to the sea with dogs, the wind blows but thanks for the heat it was (August). Only vans, AC very difficult to get down to the parking lot.
